title: Spicy beef and sausage wontons
ingredients: ['1 egg white', '1 tablespoon water', '450g lean minced beef', '450g sausagemeat', '1 tablespoon sweet chilli sauce, or to taste', '1 tablespoon Chinese five-spice powder', '1 teaspoon garlic granules', '1 spring onion, finely chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '500g wonton wrappers', '700ml vegetable oil for frying', '125ml sweet chilli sauce, for dipping']
